title: IModelDocExtension.SetSunLightSourcePropertyValues
description: Sets the property values for a sunlight source.
signature:

   MathVector
NorthDirection
,
   System.Double
NorthLatitude
,
   System.Double
EastLongitude
,
   System.Double
TimeZone
,

DateTime
)

returns: True if sunlight source property values are successfully set, false if not
